portableDataExchange.serializer

Class PortfolioPdx

  • java.lang.Object
    • portableDataExchange.serializer.PortfolioPdx

  • public class PortfolioPdx
extends Object
    An example of a portfolio object for a trading application. This example object shows how to serialize and deserialize an object by implementing the PdxSerializable interface.

    Since:
    6.6
    Author:
    GemStone Systems, Inc.
